name: MakeyMakeySoundBoard
body:
# MakeyMakeySoundBoard

This is just a simple sound board to test the [Makey  Makey](http://www.makeymakey.com/) in your browser.

## How it works ?

Run index.html in your favorite browser.

Play with your makey makey to see the key and hear the sound
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: simple html/js soundboard for makey makey
